title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, June 3, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of historical romance writer Kathleen Woodiwiss (1939-2007), who wrote her first novel secretly on a typewriter that she’d gifted to her husband.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of historical romance writer Kathleen Woodiwiss (1939-2007), who wrote her first novel secretly on a typewriter that she’d gifted to her husband.
